attributes.title: Garbage app inappropriate and overall garbage
attributes.review: This app not only took ages to download, it also took about ten minutes to open the app and when I finally opened it I was greeted by a picture of a human orange overall inappropriate and it must be deleted.

attributes.title: Hacked!!!
attributes.review: My 15 year old son downloaded this app and since the app was downloaded his tv has been playing songs by Shane Dawson on repeat!! The app also charged him $5.00 every month he had the app on his phone!!! 😱 So unless you love Shane and his music and or have 5 dollars a month DONT DOWNLOAD!!
